context: I neglected to include you in an important decision
letters:
Dear Father,

I hope this note finds you well. I am writing to express my sincerest apologies for not including you in a recent important decision that I made. It was a significant oversight on my part, and I deeply regret not seeking your guidance and perspective.

Your wisdom and experience have always been invaluable to me, and I understand that my decision should have involved your input. I failed to acknowledge how crucial your involvement is in such matters, and for that, I am truly sorry. 

I appreciate the support and care you have always provided, and it pains me to think that my actions might have suggested otherwise. I assure you that this experience has prompted me to be more mindful in the future and to recognize the importance of family collaboration in decision-making.

Thank you for your understanding, and I hope to discuss this matter with you soon. I value our relationship deeply and would like to ensure that I respect your insights moving forward.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]
